verses.name: 1 Samuel 8:16
verses.text: And he will take your menservants, and your maidservants, and your goodliest young men, and your asses, and put them to his work.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 8:17
verses.text: He will take the tenth of your sheep: and ye shall be his servants.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 8:18
verses.text: And ye shall cry out in that day because of your king which ye shall have chosen you; and the Lord will not hear you in that day.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 8:19
verses.text: Nevertheless the people refused to obey the voice of Samuel; and they said, Nay; but we will have a king over us;
